Key Arguments: The legislation is a form of censorship and silences dissenting opinions.
The government and corporate media have historically spread misinformation and propaganda.
Freedom of speech is essential, and people should be allowed to hear all sides and make their own decisions.
The exemption of government and media from the bill is hypocritical.
Notable Quotes: This is yet another ploy by the 'government' to silence any opinion but their own.
Censorship is the tool used when the lie loses its power.
